boone.map

Class Function.Sigmoid

  • java.lang.Object
    • boone.map.Function
      • boone.map.Function.Sigmoid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    Function

    public static class Function.Sigmoid
extends Function
    Sigmoid: 1 / ( 1 + e ** (- value) ) First and Second Derivative are implemented.
